entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Digby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brier Island 09:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.5°C
Wind: NNE 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to a few showers this afternoon. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Drizzle or rain showers changing to periods of snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
